. Hi, 0010
Prease try "NetMount" like this -> http://youtu.be/S1Q_jGIwrzY
Dropbox driver (with NetMount) use session value, this session key is 'elFinderNetVolumes' (as default).
You save the value of "$SESSION '[elFinderNetVolumes]'" by a certain method (for example, in a log function), By assigning the value to "$SESSION '[elFinderNetVolumes]'" at the time of a new session, "Net Volume" can be used continuously. 
P.S.

. Hi,
Since delta acquired the whole data, what is cached on a memory was the approach which is not good. 
Now, using PDO (sqlite), I am making a program change so that it may cache in a database. 
Please try on my DemoSite. (It is still a draft) 
. Thanks,
When using "metadata", it is necessary to perform "metadata" about all the directories included to a directory. I had got data by "metadata" at first.
However, the response had dissatisfaction. Then, the data obtained by "delta" was saved at temporary file, and when displaying, it was processing by developing on a memory.
Acquisition of "delta" is performed, when a user links with dropbox for the first time and uses. Data acquisition takes time to the first time. However, from the 2nd time, it is very quick. 
This time, the reason I chose PDO (SQLite) is that it can use as standard after PHP 5.1. Furthermore, it is because it thought that handling of a database file was also easy. The database file was made to be taken as another file for each users.
The next place has a Dropbox PDO type. 
https://github.com/nao-pon/elFinder/tree/dropbox_sqlite
[ja]
ありがとう！
"metadata" を使う場合、ディレクトリに含まれるディレクトリ全てについて "metadata" を実行する必要があります。
私は、最初は"metadata"でデータを得ていました。しかし、レスポンスに不満がありました。そこで、"delta" で得たデータを一時ファイルに保存し、表示する時にメモリ上に展開して処理をしていました。
"delta" の取得は、ユーザーが初めて dropbox とリンクし利用した場合に行われます。初回はデータ取得に時間を要します。しかし、2回目からはとてもクイックです。
今回、私が PDO(SQLite) を選択した理由は、PHP 5.1 以降において標準で利用できるからです。さらに、データベースファイルの取扱いも簡単だと思ったからです。データベースファイルはユーザー毎に別ファイルとするようにしてみました。
Dropbox PDO タイプは、次の場所にあります。 https://github.com/nao-pon/elFinder/tree/dropbox_sqlite
[/ja]

. Hi mlerman,
startPath is Connector configuration option. ( https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Connector-configuration-options#wiki-startPath )
php
<?php
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/',
            'startPath' => isset($_GET['path'])? $_GET['path'] : ''
        )
    )
);
. Or use URL hash. (Nightly build only)
ex. 
root/test -> http://hypweb.net/elFinder-nightly/demo/2.x/elfinder.html#elf_l1_dGVzdA
root/test/depth1 -> http://hypweb.net/elFinder-nightly/demo/2.x/elfinder.html#elf_l1_dGVzdC9kZXB0aDI
. ref. https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Connector-configuration-options#wiki-roots
And Multiple-Roots -> https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Multiple-Roots
``` php
<?php
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem', // your target volume of startPath
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/',
            'startPath' => isset($_GET['startPath'])? $_GET['startPath'] : '' // request as customData on JavaScript on HTML
        ),
        array(
            'driver' => 'MySQL',
            'host'   => 'localhost',
            'user'   => 'eluser',
            'pass'   => 'elpass',
            'db'     => 'elfinder'
            'path'   => 1,
        ),
        array(
            'driver' => 'FTP',
            'host'   => '192.168.1.1',
            'user'   => 'eluser',
            'pass'   => 'elpass',
            'path'   => '/'
        )
    )
);

html
<script>
function getQueryVariable(variable)
{
    var query = window.location.search.substring(1);
    var vars = query.split("&");
    for (var i=0;i<vars.length;i++) {
        var pair = vars[i].split("=");
        if(pair[0] == variable){return pair[1];}
    }
    return(false);
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
    // Documentation for client options:
    // https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Client-configuration-options
    $().ready(function() {
        $('#elfinder').elfinder({
            rememberLastDir : false,
            useBrowserHistory : false,
            customData : {path : getQueryVariable("path")},
            url : 'php/connector.minimal.php'  // connector URL (REQUIRED)
            // lang: 'ru',                     // language (OPTIONAL)
        });
    });
</script>
php

            'driver'        => 'LocalFileSystem',   // driver for accessing file system (REQUIRED)
            'path'          => '../files/',         // path to files (REQUIRED)

. Hi, quim3ra.
The automated script is performing packaging.
like this (bash) ...
bash
NIGHTLY_DIR=[PATH TO NIGHTLY_DIR]
BRANCH=[TARGET_BRANCH]
cd [elFinder Git dir]
rm -rf ./build/*
git checkout $BRANCH
git pull
HASH=`git log -1 --pretty=format:"%h"`
if [ ! -e "$NIGHTLY_DIR/elfinder-$BRANCH-$HASH.zip" ] ; then
  rm -f $NIGHTLY_DIR/elfinder-$BRANCH-*.zip
  sed -i "s/\(elFinder\.prototype\.version = '\)[^']*\('\)/\1"$BRANCH" (Nightly: "$HASH")\2/" js/elFinder.version.js
  jake -f myJakefile.js -C ./build elfinder
  cd ./build
  zip -r $NIGHTLY_DIR/elfinder-$BRANCH-$HASH.zip *
fi
myJakefile.js (sample): https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/u4gcf57vjqjh1ki/myJakefile.js

. Hi Bob,
When Dropbox is used by NetMount only, dropbox setting in $opt are unnecessary.
It is OK only by validating the following item on "connector(.minimal).php".
php
include_once dirname(__FILE__).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderVolumeDropbox.class.php';
define('ELFINDER_DROPBOX_CONSUMERKEY', '[YOUR APP CONSUMER KEY]');
define('ELFINDER_DROPBOX_CONSUMERSECRET', '[YOUR APP CONSUMER SECRET]');
And it is important. The next extentions are required for PHP.
1. Dropbox-PHP: http://www.dropbox-php.com/
2. PHP OAuth extension: http://pecl.php.net/package/oauth or
   PEAR's HTTP_OAUTH package: http://pear.php.net/package/http_oauth (HTTP_OAUTH require HTTP_Request2 and Net_URL2)
. My demo site's connector.mimimal.php is
``` php
<?php
error_reporting(0); // Set E_ALL for debuging
include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderConnector.class.php';
include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinder.class.php';
include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderVolumeDriver.class.php';
include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem.class.php';
// Required for MySQL storage connector
// include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderVolumeMySQL.class.php';
// Required for FTP connector support
// include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderVolumeFTP.class.php';
// Required for Dropbox.com connector support
include_once dirname(FILE).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'elFinderVolumeDropbox.class.php';
// # Dropbox volume driver need "dropbox-php's Dropbox" and "PHP OAuth extension" or "PEAR's HTTP_OAUTH package"
// * dropbox-php: http://www.dropbox-php.com/
// * PHP OAuth extension: http://pecl.php.net/package/oauth
// * PEAR's HTTP_OAUTH package: http://pear.php.net/package/http_oauth
//  * HTTP_OAUTH package require HTTP_Request2 and Net_URL2
// Dropbox driver need next two settings. You can get at https://www.dropbox.com/developers
define('ELFINDER_DROPBOX_CONSUMERKEY',    '---------------');
define('ELFINDER_DROPBOX_CONSUMERSECRET', '---------------');
/
 * Simple function to demonstrate how to control file access using "accessControl" callback.
 * This method will disable accessing files/folders starting from '.' (dot)
 *
 * @param  string  $attr  attribute name (read|write|locked|hidden)
 * @param  string  $path  file path relative to volume root directory started with directory separator
 * @return bool|null
 /
function access($attr, $path, $data, $volume) {
    return strpos(basename($path), '.') === 0       // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
        ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write')    // set read+write to false, other (locked+hidden) set to true
        :  null;                                    // else elFinder decide it itself
}
// Documentation for connector options:
// https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Connector-configuration-options
$opts = array(
    // 'debug' => true,
    'roots' => array(
        array(
            'driver'        => 'LocalFileSystem',   // driver for accessing file system (REQUIRED)
            'path'          => '../files/',         // path to files (REQUIRED)
            'URL'           => dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) . '/../files/', // URL to files (REQUIRED)
            'accessControl' => 'access'             // disable and hide dot starting files (OPTIONAL)
        )
    ),
    'bind' => array(
        'upload.presave' => 'Plugin.Watermark.onUpLoadPreSave',
    ),
    'plugin' => array(
        'Watermark' => array(
            'source' => 'hypweb_net.png'
        )
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
``

. For example
``` php
function accessCtr($attr, $path, $data, $volume) {
    $rootReg = preg_quote(rtrim('[ROOT ABSOLUTE PATH]', '/') . '/', '/');
    if (preg_match('/^'.$rootReg.'[^\/]+$/', $path)) {
        return strpos(basename($path), '.') === 0       // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
            ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write')    // set read+write to false,
            : ($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'locked');   // other (read+locked) set to true, (write+hidden) to false
    }
    return strpos(basename($path), '.') === 0       // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
        ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write')    // set read+write to false, other (locked+hidden) set to true
        :  null;                                    // else elFinder decide it itself
}
$opts = array(
    '' =>,
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/',
            'accessControl' => 'accessCtr'
        )
    )
);
``

- elFinderVolumeDriver
``` php
    public function resize($hash, $width, $height, $x, $y, $mode = 'resize', $bg = '', $degree = 0) {
        $this->lastResizeInfo = array(
            'path' => '',
            'size' => array()
        );
    if ($this->commandDisabled('resize')) {
        return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_PERM_DENIED);
    }

    if (($file = $this->file($hash)) == false) {
        return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND);
    }

    if (!$file['write'] || !$file['read']) {
        return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_PERM_DENIED);
    }

    $path4stat = $this->decode($hash);
    if (method_exists($this, 'getHandyFile')) {
        if (!$path = $this->getHandyFile($path4stat)) {
            return false;
        }
    } else {
        $path = $path4stat;
    }
    $this->lastResizeInfo['path'] = $path;

    if (!$this->canResize($path, $file)) {
        return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_UNSUPPORT_TYPE);
    }

    switch($mode) {

        case 'propresize':
            $result = $this->imgResize($path, $width, $height, true, true);
            break;

        case 'crop':
            $result = $this->imgCrop($path, $width, $height, $x, $y);
            break;

        case 'fitsquare':
            $result = $this->imgSquareFit($path, $width, $height, 'center', 'middle', ($bg ? $bg : $this->options['tmbBgColor']));
            break;

        case 'rotate':
            $result = $this->imgRotate($path, $degree, ($bg ? $bg : $this->options['tmbBgColor']));
            break;

        default:
            $result = $this->imgResize($path, $width, $height, false, true);
            break;
    }

    if ($result) {
        clearstatcache();
        $this->lastResizeInfo['size'] = @getimagesize($path);

        $this->rmTmb($file);
        $this->clearcache();
        return $this->stat($path4stat);
    }

    return false;
}

```
ex. elFinderVolumeDropbox
``` php
    protected function getHandyFile($path) {
        if ($handy = $this->getLocalName($path)) {
            if ($contents = $this->_getContents($path) and @file_put_contents($handy, $contents, LOCK_EX)) {
                return $handy;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
public function resize($hash, $width, $height, $x, $y, $mode = 'resize', $bg = '', $degree = 0) {
    $res = parent::resize($hash, $width, $height, $x, $y, $mode, $bg, $degree);
    $handy = $this->lastResizeInfo['path'];
    if ($res) {
        $path = $this->decode($hash);
        if ($fp = @fopen($handy, 'rb')) {
            if (!$this->_save($fp, $path, '', array())) {
                $res = false;
            }
            @fclose($fp);
            if ($res && $this->lastResizeInfo['size']) {
                $raw = $this->getDBdat($path);
                $raw['width'] = $this->lastResizeInfo['size'][0];
                $raw['height'] = $this->lastResizeInfo['size'][1];
                $this->updateDBdat($path, $raw);
            }
        } else {
            $res = false;
        }
    }
    $handy && file_exists($handy) && @unlink($handy);
    return $res;
}

```

connector added an option i18nFolderName
php
// enable i18n folder name that convert name to elFinderInstance.messages['folder_'+name]
'i18nFolderName'  => false,
e.g. connector.php
``` php
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver'         => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'           => '/path/to/files/',
            'i18nFolderName' => true,
        )
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
```
e.g. elfinder.html
``` javascript
// Additional translation messages
var i18nFolderMsgs = {
    'en': {
        'folder_Downloads':   'Downloads',
        'folder_Images':      'Images',
        'folder_LargeVideos': 'Videos',
        'folder_MIME-types':  'MIME types',
        'folder_Welcome':     'Welcome(Multilingual)'
    },
    'jp': {
        'folder_Downloads':   'ダウンロード',
        'folder_Images':      '画像',
        'folder_LargeVideos': '動画',
        'folder_MIME-types':  'MIMEタイプ',
        'folder_Welcome':     'ようこそ(多言語)'
    }
};
var options = {
    url      : 'php/connector.php',
    handlers : {
        init : function(e, fm) {
            // Register additional messages
            $.extend(fm.messages, i18nFolderMsgs.en, i18nFolderMsgs[fm.lang] || {});
        }
    }
}
$('#elfinder').elfinder(options);
```

. commandsOptions example
javascript
commandsOptions : {
    ///configure shortcuts of any command
    any_command_name : {
        shortcuts : [] // for disable this command's shortcuts
    },
    any_command_name : {
        shortcuts : function(fm, shortcuts) {
            // for add `CTRL + E` for this command action
            shortcuts[0]['pattern'] += ' ctrl+e';
            return shortcuts;
        }
    },
    any_command_name : {
        shortcuts : function(fm, shortcuts) {
            // for full customize of this command's shortcuts
            return [ { pattern: 'ctrl+e ctrl+down numpad_enter' + (fm.OS != 'mac' && ' enter') } ];
        }
    }
}

. Hi all! This is my mistake. I'll fix with following code.
php/elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem.class.php
``` php
    protected function doSearch($path, $q, $mimes) {
        if ($this->encoding) {
            // non UTF-8 has problem of glob() results
            return parent::doSearch($path, $q, $mimes);
        }
    $match = array();
    try {
        $iterator = new RecursiveIteratorIterator(
            new RecursiveDirectoryIterator($path,
                FilesystemIterator::FOLLOW_SYMLINKS |
                FilesystemIterator::KEY_AS_PATHNAME |
                FilesystemIterator::SKIP_DOTS
            ),
            RecursiveIteratorIterator::SELF_FIRST
        );
        foreach ($iterator as $key => $node) {
            $name = $node->getFilename();
            if ($this->stripos($name, $q) !== false) {
                $match[] = $key;
            }
        }
    } catch (Exception $e) {}

    $result = array();
    if ($match) {
        foreach($match as $p) {
            $stat = $this->stat($p);

            if (!$stat) { // invalid links
                continue;
            }

            if (!empty($stat['hidden']) || !$this->mimeAccepted($stat['mime'], $mimes)) {
                continue;
            }

            $name = $stat['name'];

            if ((!$mimes || $stat['mime'] !== 'directory')) {
                $stat['path'] = $this->path($stat['hash']);
                if ($this->URL && !isset($stat['url'])) {
                    $path = str_replace(DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, '/', substr($p, strlen($this->root) + 1));
                    $stat['url'] = $this->URL . $path;
                }

                $result[] = $stat;
            }
        }
    }
    return $result;
}

```

``` php
function elFinderMyFileCtrl($cmd, &$args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    if ($file = $volume->file($args['target'])) {
        if (preg_match('#^text/html$#', $file['mime'])) {
            $args['download'] = false;
            $args['mime'] = 'text/plain';
        }
    }
    return true;
}
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'dispInlineRegex' => '^(?:image|text/(?:plain|html)$)',
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/'
        )
    )
    'bind' => array(
        'file.pre' => array(
            'elFinderMyFileCtrl'
        )
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();

    if (isset($args['upload']) && is_array($args['upload']) && ($tempDir = $this->getTempDir($volume->getTempPath()))) {
        $names = array();
        foreach($args['upload'] as $i => $url) {
            // check chunked file upload commit
            if ($args['chunk']) {
                if ($url === 'chunkfail' && $args['mimes'] === 'chunkfail') {
                    $this->checkChunkedFile(null, $chunk, $cid, $tempDir);
                    if (preg_match('/^(.+)(.\d+(\d+)).part$/s', $chunk, $m)) {
                        $result['warning'] = $this->error(self::ERROR_UPLOAD_FILE, $m[1], self::ERROR_UPLOAD_TRANSFER);
                    }
                    return $result;
                } else {
                    $tmpfname = $tempDir . '/' . $args['chunk'];
                    $files['tmp_name'][$i] = $tmpfname;
                    $files['name'][$i] = $url;
                    $files['error'][$i] = 0;
                    $GLOBALS['elFinderTempFiles'][$tmpfname] = true;
                    break;
                }
            }
        $tmpfname = $tempDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . 'ELF_FATCH_' . md5($url.microtime(true));

        $_name = '';
        // check is data:
        if (substr($url, 0, 5) === 'data:') {
            list($data, $args['name'][$i]) = $this->parse_data_scheme($url, $extTable);
        } else {
            $fp = fopen($tmpfname, 'wb');
            $data = $this->get_remote_contents($url, 30, 5, 'Mozilla/5.0', $fp);
            $_POST['overwrite'] = false;
            $_name = preg_replace('~^.*?([^/#?]+)(?:\?.*)?(?:#.*)?$~', '$1', rawurldecode($url));
            // Check `Content-Disposition` response header
            if ($data && ($headers = get_headers($url, true)) && !empty($headers['Content-Disposition'])) {
                if (preg_match('/filename\*?=(?:(.+?)\'\')?"?([a-z0-9_.~%-]+)"?/i', $headers['Content-Disposition'], $m)) {
                    $_name = rawurldecode($m[2]);
                    if ($m[1] && strtoupper($m[1]) !== 'UTF-8' && function_exists('mb_convert_encoding')) {
                        $_name = mb_convert_encoding($_name, 'UTF-8', $m[1]);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if ($data) {
            if (isset($args['name'][$i])) {
                $_name = $args['name'][$i];
            }
            if ($_name) {
                $_ext = '';
                if (preg_match('/(\.[a-z0-9]{1,7})$/', $_name, $_match)) {
                    $_ext = $_match[1];
                }
                if ((is_resource($data) && fclose($data)) || file_put_contents($tmpfname, $data)) {
                    $GLOBALS['elFinderTempFiles'][$tmpfname] = true;
                    $_name = preg_replace($ngReg, '_', $_name);
                    list($_a, $_b) = array_pad(explode('.', $_name, 2), 2, '');
                    if ($_b === '') {
                        if ($_ext) {
                            rename($tmpfname, $tmpfname . $_ext);
                            $tmpfname = $tmpfname . $_ext;
                        }
                        $_b = $this->detectFileExtension($tmpfname);
                        $_name = $_a.$_b;
                    } else {
                        $_b = '.'.$_b;
                    }
                    if (isset($names[$_name])) {
                        $_name = $_a.'_'.$names[$_name]++.$_b;
                    } else {
                        $names[$_name] = 1;
                    }
                    $files['tmp_name'][$i] = $tmpfname;
                    $files['name'][$i] = $_name;
                    $files['error'][$i] = 0;
                } else {
                    @ unlink($tmpfname);
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
if (empty($files)) {
    return array_merge(array('error' => $this->error(self::ERROR_UPLOAD, self::ERROR_UPLOAD_NO_FILES)), $header);
}

}
``

    static protected function mimetypeInternalDetect($path = '') {
        // load default MIME table file "mime.types"
        if (!elFinderVolumeDriver::$mimetypesLoaded) {
            elFinderVolumeDriver::$mimetypesLoaded = true;
            $file = elFinder::$defaultMimefile;
            if ($file === '' || ! is_readable($file)) {
                $file = dirname(__FILE__).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'mime.types';
            }
            if (is_readable($file)) {
                $mimecf = file($file);
                foreach ($mimecf as $line_num => $line) {
                    if (!preg_match('/^\s*#/', $line)) {
                        $mime = preg_split('/\s+/', $line, -1, PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
                        for ($i = 1, $size = count($mime); $i < $size ; $i++) {
                            if (!isset(elFinderVolumeDriver::$mimetypes[$mime[$i]])) {
                                elFinderVolumeDriver::$mimetypes[$mime[$i]] = $mime[0];
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        $ext = '';
        if ($path) {
            $pinfo = pathinfo($path); 
            $ext   = isset($pinfo['extension']) ? strtolower($pinfo['extension']) : '';
        }
        return ($ext && isset(elFinderVolumeDriver::$mimetypes[$ext])) ? elFinderVolumeDriver::$mimetypes[$ext] : 'unknown';

``` javascript
var req = new XMLHttpRequest();

``` php
$opts = array(
  'bind' => array('upload' => array('smallImage'))
);
function smallImage($cmd, $result, $args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    // make image maxsize
    $maxWidth = 300;
    $maxHeight = 300;
    $jpgQuality = 70;
    $smallsDir = set_realpath('./resources/smallSize/');
    if ($volume && $result && isset($result['added'])) {
        foreach($result['added'] as $item) {
            if ($file = $volume->file($item['hash'])) {
                $path = $volume->getPath($item['hash']);
                if (strpos($file['mime'], 'image/') === 0 && ($srcImgInfo = @getimagesize($path))) {
                    $zoom = min(($maxWidth/$srcImgInfo[0]),($maxHeight/$srcImgInfo[1]));
                    $width = round($srcImgInfo[0] * $zoom);
                    $height = round($srcImgInfo[1] * $zoom);
                    $tfp = tmpfile();
                    $info = stream_get_meta_data($tfp);
                    $temp = $info['uri'];
                    if ($src = fopen($path, 'rb')) {
                        stream_copy_to_stream($src, $tfp);
                        fclose($src);
                        if ($volume->imageUtil('resize', $temp, compact('width', 'height', 'jpgQuality'))) {
                            @copy($temp, $smallsDir . '/' . $file['name']);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

 on-demand loading of CodeMirror JS 
``javascript
commandsOptions: {
    edit: {
        editors : [
            {
                // CodeMirror
                //mimes` is not set for support everything kind of text file
                load : function(textarea) {
                    var cmUrl = '//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.26.0/',
                        dfrd = $.Deferred(),
                        self = this,
                        init = function() {
                            var ta   = $(textarea),
                                base = ta.parent(),
                                editorBase;
                        // set base height
                        base.height(base.height());

                        // CodeMirror configure
                        editor = CodeMirror.fromTextArea(textarea, {
                            lineNumbers: true,
                            lineWrapping: true
                        });

                        // return editor instance
                        dfrd.resolve(editor);

                        // Auto mode set
                        var info, m, mode, spec;
                        if (! info) {
                            info = CodeMirror.findModeByMIME(self.file.mime);
                        }
                        if (! info && (m = self.file.name.match(/.+\.([^.]+)$/))) {
                            info = CodeMirror.findModeByExtension(m[1]);
                        }
                        if (info) {
                            CodeMirror.modeURL = cmUrl + 'mode/%N/%N.js';
                            mode = info.mode;
                            spec = info.mime;
                            editor.setOption('mode', spec);
                            CodeMirror.autoLoadMode(editor, mode);
                            // show MIME:mode in title bar
                            base.prev().children('.elfinder-dialog-title').append(' (' + spec + ' : ' + mode + ')');
                        }

                        // editor base node
                        editorBase = $(editor.getWrapperElement());
                        ta.data('cm', true);

                        // fit height to base
                        editorBase.height('100%');

                        // TextArea button and Setting button
                        $('<div class="ui-dialog-buttonset"/>').css('float', 'left')
                        .append(
                            $('<button>TextArea</button>')
                            .button()
                            .on('click', function(){
                                if (ta.data('cm')) {
                                    ta.removeData('cm');
                                    editorBase.hide();
                                    ta.val(editor.getValue()).show().focus();
                                    $(this).text('CodeMirror');
                                } else {
                                    ta.data('cm', true);
                                    editorBase.show();
                                    editor.setValue(ta.hide().val());
                                    editor.refresh();
                                    editor.focus();
                                    $(this).text('TextArea');
                                }
                            })
                        )
                        .prependTo(base.next());
                    };
                // load script then init
                if (typeof CodeMirror === 'undefined') {
                    this.fm.loadScript([
                        cmUrl + 'codemirror.min.js',
                        cmUrl + 'addon/mode/loadmode.js',
                        cmUrl + 'mode/meta.js'
                    ], init);
                    this.fm.loadCss(cmUrl + 'codemirror.css');
                } else {
                    init();
                }
                return dfrd;
            },
            close : function(textarea, instance) {
                instance && instance.toTextArea();
            },
            save : function(textarea, instance) {
                instance && $(textarea).data('cm') && (textarea.value = instance.getValue());
            },
            focus : function(textarea, instance) {
                instance && $(textarea).data('cm') && instance.focus();
            },
            resize : function(textarea, instance, e, data) {
                instance && instance.refresh();
            }
        }
    ]
}

}

            if ($file['name'] === 'hidden') {
                unset($result['files'][$i]);
            }
        }
        $result['files'] = array_values($result['files']);
    }
    if (! empty($result['tree'])) {
        foreach($result['tree'] as $i => $file) {
            if ($file['name'] === 'hidden') {
                unset($result['tree'][$i]);
            }
        }
        $result['tree'] = array_values($result['tree']);
    }
}

. @leo1989work Sort of File type (kind) will be evaluated in the MIME type. So if you want to sort by file extension, use the client configurationsortRules`.
e.g.
``` javascript
$('#elfinder').elfinder({
    // Connector URL
    url : 'php/connector.minimal.php',
sortRules: {
    kind: function(file1, file2){
        return file1.name.split('.').pop().toLowerCase().localeCompare(file2.name.split('.').pop().toLowerCase());
    }
}

});
```

`` php
function function access($attr, $path) {
    if (rtrim($path, '/') === '/ABSOLUTE_PATH_TO/elfinder_root/files') {
        return ($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'locked');   // set read+locked to true, other (write+hidden) set to false
    }
    // And more rules here
    // e.g. basic control of file/folder begins with '.' (dot).
    return strpos(basename($path), '.') === 0       // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
        ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write')    // set read+write to false, other (locked+hidden) set to true
        :  null;                                    // else elFinder decide it itself
}

. @leo1989work Please uniqueName override inherited the volume driver.
e.g. (not tested)
``` php
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    /
     * Return new unique name based on file name and suffix
     
     * @param $dir
     * @param $name
     * @param  string $suffix suffix append to name
     * @param bool $checkNum
     * @param int $start
     * @return string
     * @internal param string $path file path
     /
    public function uniqueName($dir, $name, $suffix = '', $checkNum = true, $start = 1) {
        $ext  = '';
    if (preg_match('/\.((tar\.(gz|bz|bz2|z|lzo))|cpio\.gz|ps\.gz|xcf\.(gz|bz2)|[a-z0-9]{1,4})$/i', $name, $m)) {
        $ext  = '.'.$m[1];
        $name = substr($name, 0,  strlen($name)-strlen($m[0]));
    }

    if ($checkNum && preg_match('/('.preg_quote($suffix, '/').')(\d*)$/i', $name, $m)) {
        $i    = (int)$m[2];
        $name = substr($name, 0, strlen($name)-strlen($m[2]));
    } else {
        $i     = $start;
        $name .= $suffix;
    }
    $max = $i+100000;

    while ($i <= $max) {
        $n = $name.($i > 0 ? '('.$i.')' : '').$ext;

        if (!$this->stat($this->joinPathCE($dir, $n))) {
            $this->clearcache();
            return $n;
        }
        $i++;
    }
    return $name.md5($dir).$ext;
}

}
```

php
function myRenamePre($cmd, &$args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    $target = $args['target'];
    $newName = $args['name'];
    if ($org = $volume->file($target)) {
        $orgInfo = pathinfo($org['name']);
        $newInfo = pathinfo($newName);
        if ($orgInfo['extension'] !== $newInfo['extension']) {
            $args['name'] = $newInfo['filename'] . ($orgInfo['extension']? '.' . $orgInfo['extension'] : '');
        }
    }
}

``` php
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    public function mkfile($dst, $name) {

            return false;
        }
        return parent::mkfile($dst, $name);
    }
public function paste($volume, $src, $dst, $rmSrc = false, $hashes = array()) {
    if ($this->root === $this->decode($dst)) {
        return false;
    }
    return parent::paste($volume, $src, $dst, $rmSrc, $hashes);
}

public function upload($fp, $dst, $name, $tmpname, $hashes = array()) {
    if ($this->root === $this->decode($dst)) {
        return false;
    }
    return parent::upload($fp, $dst, $name, $tmpname, $hashes);
}

}

. @phtsaibb You can get netvolumes config with $this->session->get('netvolume', array()) in volume driver.
Extends the volume class. e.g. case of  #1451(LocalFileSystem)
php
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    public function netmountPrepare($options) {
        $netVolumes = $this->session->get('netvolume', array());
        foreach($netVolumes as $nv) {
            if ($nv['protocol'] === $options['protocol'] && $nv['host'] === $options['host']) {
                if (strpos($options['path'], $nv['path']) === 0) {
                    return array(
                        'exit'  => true,
                        'error' => 'Parent folder is already mounted.'
                    );
                }
            }
        }
        return $options;
    }
}
// register as netmount drive
elFinder::$netDrivers['localfilesystem'] = 'MyLocalFileSystem';

OR If you want to control the naming convention, Please use your custom volume driver that overridden elFinderVolumeDriver::tmbname().
e.g.
php
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    /**
     * Return thumbnail file name for required file
     *
     * @param  array  $stat  file stat
     * @return string
     * @author Dmitry (dio) Levashov
     **/
    protected function tmbname($stat) {
        return $stat['name'].'.png';
    }
}
. Use MyLocalFileSystem as volume driver class. ('driver' => 'MyLocalFileSystem')
Simple example of connector.minimal.php ...
``` php
<?php
// elFinder autoload
require './autoload.php';
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    /
     * Return thumbnail file name for required file
     *
     * @param  array  $stat  file stat
     * @return string
     * @author Dmitry (dio) Levashov
     /
    protected function tmbname($stat) {
        return $stat['name'].'.png';
    }
}
/
 * Simple function to demonstrate how to control file access using "accessControl" callback.
 * This method will disable accessing files/folders starting from '.' (dot)
 *
 * @param  string  $attr  attribute name (read|write|locked|hidden)
 * @param  string  $path  file path relative to volume root directory started with directory separator
 * @return bool|null
 /
function access($attr, $path, $data, $volume) {
    return strpos(basename($path), '.') === 0       // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
        ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write')    // set read+write to false, other (locked+hidden) set to true
        :  null;                                    // else elFinder decide it itself
}
// Documentation for connector options:
// https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Connector-configuration-options
$opts = array(
    // 'debug' => true,
    'roots' => array(
        array(
            'driver'        => 'MyLocalFileSystem',         // driver for accessing file system (REQUIRED)
            'path'          => '../files/',                 // path to files (REQUIRED)
            'URL'           => dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) . '/../files/', // URL to files (REQUIRED)
            'uploadDeny'    => array('all'),                // All Mimetypes not allowed to upload
            'uploadAllow'   => array('image', 'text/plain'),// Mimetype image and text/plain allowed to upload
            'uploadOrder'   => array('deny', 'allow'),      // allowed Mimetype image and text/plain only
            'accessControl' => 'access'                     // disable and hide dot starting files (OPTIONAL)
        )
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
``

elFinder complies with the file attributes of a typical file system.
. Renamable operate on files of the write-protected is a specification of the common file system, such as Linux.
. The operation of elFinder by the file attribute is by design. If you need to change the specifications, please customize the elFinder.

- Front end  - JavaScript
`` javascript

return f && f.phash && !f.locked && f.write ? h : null }).length ==

- Back end - PHP connector
``` php
// customized volume driver
class elFinderMyVolumeLocalFileSystem extends
elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem extends
{
    protected function remove($path, $force = false) {
        if (! $force && ($stat = $this->stat($path)) && !
$stat['write']) {
            return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_PERM_DENIED,
$this->path($stat['hash']));
        }
        return parent::remove($path, $force);
    }
}
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/',
        ),
        array(
            'driver' => 'MyLocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files2/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files2/',
            'uiCmdMap' => 'array('rm' => 'rm2'), // use rm2 instead rm
        ),
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
```

. @smitshah81 You can immediately make thumbnails by the client configuration option of "handlers.paste".
e.g.
javascript
handlers : {
    paste : function(e, fm) {
        if (e.data && e.data.added) {
            var tmbNum = fm.options.loadTmbs > 0 ? fm.options.loadTmbs : 5,
                tmbs = $.map(e.data.added, function(f) { return f && f.tmb && f.tmb == '1' ? f.hash : null; }),
                gets = function() {
                    if (tmbs.length) {
                        fm.request({
                            data : {cmd : 'tmb', targets : tmbs.splice(0, tmbNum)},
                            preventFail : true
                        }).always(gets);
                    }
                };
            tmbs.length && gets();
        }
    }
}

. @alsantos123 To do this you will need to extend the duplicate command of elFinder.
This is an example. it require elFInder >= 2.1.15. Please use the nightly build up to 2.1.15 release.
JavaScript
`` javascript
// custom ui commandmyduplicateextendsduplicate`
(elFinder.prototype.commands.myduplicate = function() {
    var fm = this.fm;
    this.getstate = function(sel) {
        var sel = this.files(sel),
            cnt = sel.length;
    return !this._disabled && cnt && fm.cwd().write && $.map(sel, function(f) { return f.mime !== 'directory' && f.phash && f.read && f.phash === fm.cwd().hash? f : null  }).length == cnt ? 0 : -1;
}

}).prototype = {
     forceLoad : true,
     extendsCmd : 'duplicate'
};
var options = {
    url  : 'php/connector.php'
}
$('#elfinder').elfinder(options);
```
PHP connector
``` php
// custom volume driver
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    public function duplicate($hash, $suffix='copy') {
        $file = $this->file($hash);
        if ($file && $file['mime'] === 'directory') {
            return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_COPY, 'Folder:' . $file['name']);
        }
    return parent::duplicate($hash, $suffix);
}

}
// use custom volume driver MyLocalFileSystem and ui command myduplicate
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver'   => 'MyLocalFileSystem',
            'path'     => '/path/to/files/',
            'uiCmdMap' => array('duplicate' => 'myduplicate'),
        )
    )
);
``

                return dfrd.reject('errResponse', xhr);

            var resolve = function() {
                response = self.normalize(response);

                /*--- debug ---*/
                self.log(response);

                if (!self.api) {
                    self.api    = response.api || 1;
                    if (self.api == '2.0' && typeof response.options.uploadMaxSize !== 'undefined') {

                    }
                    self.newAPI = self.api >= 2;
                    self.oldAPI = !self.newAPI;

                if (response.options) {

                    self.uplMaxFile = !!response.uplMaxFile? parseInt(response.uplMaxFile) : 20;

            };

. This is a basic example. But it require nightly build or elFinder >= 2.1.15.
``` javascript
commandsOptions : {
    getfile : {
        onlyURL  : false,
        // allow to return multiple files info
        multiple : false,
        // allow to return filers info
        folders  : false,
        // get image sizes before callback call
        getImgSize : false
    }
},
getFileCallback : function(file, fm) {
    var localId = 'l1_';
    var localTargetHash = localId + 'Lw'; // 'Lw' = '/' = root
if (file.hash.indexOf(localId) !== 0) {
    var dfd = $.Deferred();

    fm.clipboard([ file.hash ], 0);

    fm.exec('paste', localTargetHash)
    .done(function(copy, paste) {
        if (paste && paste.added && paste.added.length) {
            fm.one('pastedone', function() {
                dfd = fm.exec('getfile', paste.added[0].hash);
            });
            return dfd;
        }
        dfd.reject();
    })
    .fail(function() {
        dfd.reject();
    });

    return dfd;
} else {
    fm.log(file.url);
}

}
``

var elf = $('#elfinder').elfinder({
    url : '//hypweb.net/elFinder-nightly/demo/2.1/php-jsb/basic.php'

    .on("dragenter", function(e){

    .on('drop', function(e) {
        e.stopPropagation();
        e.preventDefault();
        var target = 'l3_Lw';
        var file = false,
            type = '',
            data = null,
            trf = e.originalEvent.dataTransfer || null,
            kind = (trf.items && trf.items.length && trf.items[0].kind)? trf.items[0].kind : '';
    if (trf) {
        if (kind === 'file' && (trf.items[0].getAsEntry || trf.items[0].webkitGetAsEntry)) {
            file = trf;
            type = 'data';
        } else if (kind !== 'string' && trf.files && trf.files.length && $.inArray('Text', trf.types) === -1) {
            file = trf.files;
            type = 'files';
        }
    }
    if (file) {
        elf.upload({files : file, type : type, target : target})
            .done(function() {
                elf.exec('open', target);
            });
    }
});

. @marcomarsala This is possible with connector main option bind.
e.g. - add CSS class name elfinder-dir-empty to empty folder of the LocalFileSystem volume.
``` php
function setEmptyFolderCssName($cmd, &$result, $args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    if ($volume && $volume instanceof elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem && $result) {
        $key = '';
        if (! empty($result['files'])) {
            $key = 'files';
        } else if (! empty($result['tree'])) {
            $key = 'tree';
        } else if (! empty($result['added'])) {
            $key = 'added';
        }
        if ($key) {
            foreach($result[$key] as $i => $file) {
                if (isset($file['mime']) && $file['mime'] === 'directory') {
                    $path = $volume->getPath($file['hash']);
                    if (($items = scandir($path)) && count($items) === 2) {
                        $result[$key][$i]['csscls'] = 'elfinder-dir-empty';
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
$opts = array(
    'bind' => array( 'open tree parent mkdir' => array( 'setEmptyFolderCssName' ) ),
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/'
        )
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
``

. @wzfjesun You can use connector option bind and volume option disabled, as one of the method.

for example (but not tested)
``` php
<?php
function isDiskFull() {
    // must be return true if disk full
    return true;
}
// bind callback for 'rm.pre'
function preCheckDiskFull($cmd, $args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    $GLOBALS['prevFull'] = isDiskFull();
}
// bind callback for 'upload paste duplicate extract rm'
function checkDiskFull($cmd, $result, $args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    $isFull = isDiskFull();
    if ($cmd === 'rm') {
        if (! $isFull && $GLOBALS['prevFull']) {
            // request sync() to elFinder UI
            return true;
        }
    } else {
        if ($isFull) {
            // request sync() to elFinder UI
            return true;
        }
    }
}
$disableds = isDiskFull()? array('upload', 'paste', 'duplicate', 'extract', 'mkfile', 'mkdir') : array();
$opts = array(
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver'   => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'     => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'      => 'http://localhost/to/files/',
            'disabled' => $disableds
        )
    ),
    // bind function for refresh elFinder UI
    'bind' => array(
        'rm.pre' => array('preCheckDiskFull').
        'upload paste duplicate extract rm' => array('checkDiskFull')
    ),
    // set disabled commands
    'disabled' = $disableds
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
```

. @ecsumed You can use connector main option bind.
For example.
PHP should have been run in the super-user privileges.
``` php
$opts = array(
    'bind' => array('upload' => array('uploadCallBack')),
    'roots'  => array(
        array(
            'driver' => 'LocalFileSystem',
            'path'   => '/path/to/files/',
            'URL'    => 'http://localhost/to/files/'
        )
    )
);
function uploadCallBack($cmd, $result, $args, $elfinder, $volume) {
    if ($volume && $result && isset($result['added'])) {
        $user = 'user';
        $group = 'group';
        foreach($result['added'] as $item) {
            if ($file = $volume->file($item['hash'])) {
                $path = $volume->getPath($item['hash']);
                chown($path, $user);
                chgrp($path, $group);
            }
        }
    }
}
``

. @consc198 If you are integrated with any other system (WordPress?), It seems to $_POST and $_GET etc values has been escaped by that system. Please restore to the original values before processing with elFinder, or please try the following example.
``` php
class My_elFinderConnector extends elFinderConnector
{
    protected function input_filter($args) {
        if (is_array($args)) {
            return array_map(array(& $this, 'input_filter'), $args);
        }
        $res = str_replace("\0", '', $args);
        $res = stripslashes($res);
        return $res;
    }
}
// run elFinder
$connector = new My_elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();
```

e.g.
javascript
handlers : {
    // Auto crop OR Auto resize
    upload : function(e, fm) {
        var uploadedFiles = e.data.added,
            mode = {
                resize: {
                    mode: 'resize',
                    width: 500,
                    height: 500
                },
                crop: {
                    mode: 'crop',
                    width: 500,
                    height: 500,
                    x: 100,
                    y: 100
                }
            };
        if (uploadedFiles.length) {
            $.each(uploadedFiles, function() {
                if (this.read && this.write && this.mime.indexOf('image/') !== -1) {
                    fm.request($.extend(
                        {
                            cmd: 'resize',
                            target: this.hash
                        },
                        mode['crop'] /* or mode['resize'] */
                    ));
                }
            });
        }
    }
}

. @nganivet RFC 6266 is applied to the Chrome in the current version. The actual code is as follows. Please check in the latest version or nightly build.
php
$filenameEncoded = rawurlencode($file['name']);
if (strpos($filenameEncoded, '%') === false) { // ASCII only
    $filename = 'filename="'.$file['name'].'"';
} else {
    $ua = $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'];
    if (preg_match('/MSIE [4-8]/', $ua)) { // IE < 9 do not support RFC 6266 (RFC 2231/RFC 5987)
        $filename = 'filename="'.$filenameEncoded.'"';
    } elseif (strpos($ua, 'Chrome') === false && strpos($ua, 'Safari') !== false && preg_match('#Version/[3-5]#', $ua)) { // Safari < 6
        $filename = 'filename="'.str_replace('"', '', $file['name']).'"';
    } else { // RFC 6266 (RFC 2231/RFC 5987)
        $filename = 'filename*=UTF-8\'\''.$filenameEncoded;
    }
}

. OK, You can get toolbar DOM by fm.getUI('toolbar') and controllable it.
There is a live example for it. -> http://jsbin.com/nerese/edit?html,output
```javascript
$('#elfinder').elfinder({
    url : 'php/connector.php',
    handlers: {
        init: function(e, fm) {
            fm.one('open', function() {
                var tm,
                    toolbarLive,
                    clearTm = function() {
                        tm && clearTimeout(tm);
                    },
                    toolbar = fm.getUI('toolbar')
                        .addClass('ui-front')
                        .css({position:'absolute'})
                        .hide()
                        .on('mouseenter', function() {
                            toolbarLive = true;
                        })
                        .on('mouseleave', function() {
                            toolbarLive = false;
                            toolbarHide();
                        }),
                    toolbarHide = function() {
                        clearTm();
                        tm = setTimeout(function() {
                            ! toolbarLive && toolbar.hide();
                        }, 500);
                    };
            fm.trigger('uiresize');
            fm.getUI('cwd')
                .on('mouseenter', '[id]', function() {
                    var $this = $(this);
                    clearTm();
                    tm = setTimeout(function() {
                        var offset = $this.offset();
                        toolbar.css({top: offset.top+$this.height()}).show();
                    }, 1500);
                })
                .on('mouseleave', '[id]', function() {
                    toolbarHide();
                });
        });
    }
}

});

var fm = $('elfinder').elfinder(opts).elfinder('instance');
fm.bind('init', function(event, fm) {});
fm.bind('init', function(event, fm) {});

function putConvEncord($cmd, &$args, $elfinder, $volume) {

    }

$opts = array(

```php
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    protected function tmbname($stat) {
        $dir = $this->relpathCE($this->decode($stat['phash']));
        if (! is_dir($this->tmbPath.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$dir)) {
            $dirs = explode(DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $dir);
            $target = $this->tmbPath;
            foreach($dirs as $_dir) {
                if (! is_dir($target . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_dir)) {
                    mkdir($target . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_dir);
                }
                $target = $target . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_dir;
            }
        }
        return $dir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $stat['name'] . '.png';
    }
protected function gettmb($path, $stat) {
    if ($name = parent::gettmb($path, $stat)) {
        $name = str_replace('\\', '/', $name); // For windows server
        $name = str_replace('%2F', '/', rawurlencode($name));
    }
    return $name;
}

public function tmb($hash) {
    if ($name = parent::tmb($hash)) {
        $name = str_replace('\\', '/', $name); // For windows server
        $name = str_replace('%2F', '/', rawurlencode($name));
    }
    return $name;
}

}
```

php
class elFinderVolumeMyLocalFileSystem extends elFinderVolumeLocalFileSystem
{
    protected function updateCache($path, $stat) {
        if (! empty($stat) && is_array($stat) && $stat['mime'] === 'directory') {
            $name = $this->_basename($path);
            if ($name === 'cmdtest') {
                if (! isset($stat['options'])) {
                    $stat['options'] = array();
                }
                if (! isset($stat['options']['disabled'])) {
                    $stat['options']['disabled'] = $this->disabled;
                }
                array_push($stat['options']['disabled'], 'mkdir', 'paste');
            }
        }
        return parent::updateCache($path, $stat);
    }
    public function mkdir($dsthash, $name) {
        if ($dir = $this->dir($dsthash)) {
            if ($dir['name'] === 'cmdtest') {
                return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_PERM_DENIED);
            }
        }
        return parent::mkdir($dsthash, $name);
    }
    public function paste($volume, $src, $dst, $rmSrc = false, $hashes = array()) {
        if ($dir = $this->dir($dst)) {
            if ($dir['name'] === 'cmdtest') {
                return $this->setError(elFinder::ERROR_PERM_DENIED);
            }
        }
        return parent::paste($volume, $src, $dst, $rmSrc, $hashes);
    }

``javascript
"use strict";
/**
 * elFinder client options and main script for RequireJS
 *
 * Rename "main.default.js" to "main.js" and edit it if you need configure elFInder options or any things. And use that in elfinder.html.
 * e.g.`
 **/
(function(){
    var // jQuery and jQueryUI version
        jqver = '3.1.1',
        uiver = '1.12.1',
    // Detect language (optional)
    lang = (function() {
        var locq = window.location.search,
            fullLang, locm, lang;
        if (locq && (locm = locq.match(/lang=([a-zA-Z_-]+)/))) {
            // detection by url query (?lang=xx)
            fullLang = locm[1];
        } else {
            // detection by browser language
            fullLang = (navigator.browserLanguage || navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage);
        }
        lang = fullLang.substr(0,2);
        if (lang === 'ja') lang = 'jp';
        else if (lang === 'pt') lang = 'pt_BR';
        else if (lang === 'ug') lang = 'ug_CN';
        else if (lang === 'zh') lang = (fullLang.substr(0,5) === 'zh-TW')? 'zh_TW' : 'zh_CN';
        return lang;
    })(),

    // elFinder options (REQUIRED)
    // Documentation for client options:
    // https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Client-configuration-options
    opts = {
        url : 'php/connector.minimal.php', // connector URL (REQUIRED)
        lang: lang                         // auto detected language (optional)
    },

    // Start elFinder (REQUIRED)
    start = function(elFinder) {
        // load jQueryUI CSS
        elFinder.prototype.loadCss('//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/'+uiver+'/themes/smoothness/jquery-ui.css');

        $(function() {
            // Optional for Japanese decoder "extras/encoding-japanese.min"
            if (window.Encoding && Encoding.convert) {
                elFinder.prototype._options.rawStringDecoder = function(s) {
                    return Encoding.convert(s,{to:'UNICODE',type:'string'});
                };
            }
            // Make elFinder (REQUIRED)
            var node = $('#elfinder').elfinder(opts);
            var elf = node.elfinder('instance');

            // fit to window.height on window.resize
            var resizeTimer = null;
            $(window).resize(function() {
                resizeTimer && clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
                if (! node.hasClass('elfinder-fullscreen')) {
                    resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
                        var h = parseInt($(window).height());
                        if (h != parseInt(node.height())) {
                            elf.resize('100%', h);
                        }
                    }, 200);
                }
            });
        });
    },

    // JavaScript loader (REQUIRED)
    load = function() {
        require(
            [
                'elfinder'
                , (lang !== 'en')? 'elfinder.lang' : null    // load detected language
            //  , 'extras/quicklook.googledocs'              // optional preview for GoogleApps contents on the GoogleDrive volume
            //  , (lang === 'jp')? 'extras/encoding-japanese.min' : null // optional Japanese decoder for archive preview
            ],
            start,
            function(error) {
                alert(error.message);
            }
        );
    },

    // is IE8? for determine the jQuery version to use (optional)
    ie8 = (typeof window.addEventListener === 'undefined' && typeof document.getElementsByClassName === 'undefined');

// config of RequireJS (REQUIRED)
require.config({
    baseUrl : 'js',
    paths : {
        'jquery'   : '//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/'+(ie8? '1.12.4' : jqver)+'/jquery.min',
        'jquery-ui': '//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/'+uiver+'/jquery-ui.min',
        'elfinder' : 'elfinder.min',
        'elfinder.lang': [
            'i18n/elfinder.'+lang,
            'i18n/elfinder.fallback'
        ]
    },
    waitSeconds : 10 // optional
});

// load JavaScripts (REQUIRED)
load();

})();

class mydebug
{
    public function debugLog() {
        if (! defined('ELFINDER_API_VER')) {
            if (elFinder::$phpErrors) {
                $o = join("\n", elFinder::$phpErrors) . "\n";
                file_put_contents(__DIR__ . '/.debuglog.txt', $o, FILE_APPEND);
            }
        }
    }
}

On network drives often require considerably more time than uploading to the web server. Also, since elFinder does not have an API to know the progress status on the Web server, it can not display its progress.. It is impossible with the current elFinder API.. If you use FlySystem, you need to upload the file to the web server. To send directly to GCS stream, you need to send it directly to GCS from the browser. elFinder does not have such a mechanism.. FlySystem supports streams. The situation does not change even if the connector driver of elFinder on web server directly uses the GCS adapter.
The elFinder client does not have an API to access the GCS connector or GCS directly.
Data sequence of the file upload
```
                Browser      Web server         GCS
Show first progress|------------->|              |
                   |Chunked upload|              |
Redraw progress bar|<-------------|              |
                   |------------->|              |
                   |Chunked upload|              |
Redraw progress bar|<-------------|              |
Show 2nd progress  |------------->|              |
                   |     Done     |              |
                   |              |------------->|
                   |              |Chunked upload|
                   |              |<-------------|
                   |              |------------->|
                   |              |Chunked upload|
                   |              |<-------------|
                   |              |------------->|
                   |              |     Done     |
                   |              |<-------------|
                   |              |    Results   |
Redraw progress bar|<-------------|              |
                   |   Results    |              |
```. Have you understood the diagram of "Data sequence of the file upload"? It is as shown in that figure.
To upload directly from the browser to GCS, you need to have a connector that works with JavaScript. We do not have that plan.
There is no choice but to wait for you to make or someone else to make it.. I do not know what you want, but FileStream's handling is as follows.

elFinder client do chunked upload to elFinder connector
After upload is complete, elFinder connector pass thru file stream to FlySystem driver
FlySystem driver pass thru file stream to FlySystem
FlySystem pass thru file stream to GCS adapter

If the GCS adapter can handle file streams, I think uploading to GCS will be done in the stream,  but I do not know that part.. - elFinder client do upload to elFinder connector
- After upload is complete, elFinder connector pass thru file stream to FlySystem driver
- FlySystem driver pass thru file stream to FlySystem
- FlySystem pass thru file stream to GCS adapter

var fm = $('#elfinder').elfinder(opts).elfinder('instance');
$('#drop').droppable({
    accept : '.elfinder-cwd-file-wrapper,.elfinder-tree-dir,.elfinder-cwd-file',
    over : function(e, ui) {
        var helper = ui.helper;
        e.stopPropagation();
        helper.data('dropover', helper.data('dropover') + 1);
        helper.addClass('elfinder-drag-helper-plus');
        fm.trigger('unlockfiles', {files : helper.data('files'), helper: helper});
    },
    out : function(e, ui) {
        var helper = ui.helper,
            ctr    = (e.shiftKey||e.ctrlKey||e.metaKey);
        e.stopPropagation();
        helper.toggleClass('elfinder-drag-helper-move elfinder-drag-helper-plus', helper.data('locked')? true : ctr).data('dropover', Math.max(helper.data('dropover') - 1, 0));
        fm.trigger(ctr? 'unlockfiles' : 'lockfiles', {files : helper.data('files'), helper: helper});
    },
    drop : function(e, ui) {
        var helper  = ui.helper,
            res = [];
    // set helper data and hide
    helper.data('droped', true).hide();
    // helper.data('files') has target item hashes
    $.each(helper.data('files'), function(i, hash) {
        var file = fm.file(hash);
        if (file) {
            res.push(file.hash + ' : ' + file.name);
        }
    });
    $(this).html(res.join('<br>'));
}

});

As an example of allowing only root directory names beginning with ".", There is an access () function in connector.minimal.php-dist.
php
/**
 * Simple function to demonstrate how to control file access using "accessControl" callback.
 * This method will disable accessing files/folders starting from '.' (dot)
 *
 * @param  string    $attr    attribute name (read|write|locked|hidden)
 * @param  string    $path    absolute file path
 * @param  string    $data    value of volume option `accessControlData`
 * @param  object    $volume  elFinder volume driver object
 * @param  bool|null $isDir   path is directory (true: directory, false: file, null: unknown)
 * @param  string    $relpath file path relative to volume root directory started with directory separator
 * @return bool|null
 **/
function access($attr, $path, $data, $volume, $isDir, $relpath) {
    $basename = basename($path);
    return $basename[0] === '.'                  // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
             && strlen($relpath) !== 1           // but with out volume root
        ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write') // set read+write to false, other (locked+hidden) set to true
        :  null;                                 // else elFinder decide it itself

(function(){
    var // jQuery and jQueryUI version
        jqver = '3.2.1',
        uiver = '1.12.1',
    // Detect language (optional)
    lang = (function() {
        var locq = window.location.search,
            fullLang, locm, lang;
        if (locq && (locm = locq.match(/lang=([a-zA-Z_-]+)/))) {
            // detection by url query (?lang=xx)
            fullLang = locm[1];
        } else {
            // detection by browser language
            fullLang = (navigator.browserLanguage || navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage);
        }
        lang = fullLang.substr(0,2);
        if (lang === 'ja') lang = 'jp';
        else if (lang === 'pt') lang = 'pt_BR';
        else if (lang === 'ug') lang = 'ug_CN';
        else if (lang === 'zh') lang = (fullLang.substr(0,5).toLowerCase() === 'zh-tw')? 'zh_TW' : 'zh_CN';
        return lang;
    })(),

    // elFinder options (REQUIRED)
    // Documentation for client options:
    // https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Client-configuration-options
    opts = {
        url : 'php/connector.minimal.php' // connector URL (REQUIRED)
        ,lang: lang                       // auto detected language (optional)
        ,commandsOptions : {
            edit : {
                extraOptions : {
                    // set API key to enable Creative Cloud image editor
                    // see https://console.adobe.io/
                    creativeCloudApiKey : '',
                    // browsing manager URL for CKEditor, TinyMCE
                    // uses self location with the empty value
                    managerUrl : ''
                }
            }
            ,quicklook : {
                // to enable preview with Google Docs Viewer
                googleDocsMimes : ['application/pdf', 'image/tiff', 'application/vnd.ms-office', 'application/msword', 'application/vnd.ms-word', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'application/vnd.ms-powerpoint', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet']
            }
        }
                    ,rememberLastDir : false  // disable navigate to memorized last directory
    },

    // Start elFinder (REQUIRED)
    start = function(elFinder, editors, elfinderOpts) {
        // load jQueryUI CSS
        elFinder.prototype.loadCss('//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/'+uiver+'/themes/smoothness/jquery-ui.css');

        $(function() {
            // Optional for Japanese decoder "extras/encoding-japanese.min"
            if (window.Encoding && Encoding.convert) {
                elFinder.prototype._options.rawStringDecoder = function(s) {
                    return Encoding.convert(s,{to:'UNICODE',type:'string'});
                };
            }

            // add root param
            if (elfinderOpts) {
                opts.customData = { 'root' : elfinderOpts.root };
            }

            // editors marges to opts.commandOptions.edit
            opts.commandsOptions.edit.editors = (opts.commandsOptions.edit.editors || []).concat(editors);

            // Make elFinder (REQUIRED)
            $('#elfinder').elfinder(opts);
        });
    },

    // JavaScript loader (REQUIRED)
    load = function() {
        require(
            [
                'elfinder'
                , 'extras/editors.default'                   // load text, image editors
                , 'elfinderOpts'
                , (lang !== 'en')? 'elfinder.lang' : null    // load detected language
            //  , 'extras/quicklook.googledocs'              // optional preview for GoogleApps contents on the GoogleDrive volume
            //  , (lang === 'jp')? 'extras/encoding-japanese.min' : null // optional Japanese decoder for archive preview
            ],
            start,
            function(error) {
                alert(error.message);
            }
        );
    },

    // is IE8? for determine the jQuery version to use (optional)
    ie8 = (typeof window.addEventListener === 'undefined' && typeof document.getElementsByClassName === 'undefined');

// config of RequireJS (REQUIRED)
require.config({
    baseUrl : 'js',
    paths : {
        'jquery'   : '//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/'+(ie8? '1.12.4' : jqver)+'/jquery.min',
        'jquery-ui': '//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/'+uiver+'/jquery-ui.min',
        'elfinder' : 'elfinder.min',
        'elfinder.lang': [
            'i18n/elfinder.'+lang,
            'i18n/elfinder.fallback'
        ]
    },
    waitSeconds : 10 // optional
});

// load JavaScripts (REQUIRED)
load();

})();

    protected function _copy($source, $targetDir, $name)
    {
        $source = $this->_normpath($source);
        $targetDir = $this->_normpath($targetDir);
    try {
        $file = new \Google_Service_Drive_DriveFile();
        $file->setName($name);

        //Set the Parent id
        list(, $parentId) = $this->_gd_splitPath($targetDir);
        $file->setParents([$parentId]);

        list(, $srcId) = $this->_gd_splitPath($source);
        $file = $this->service->files->copy($srcId, $file, ['fields' => self::FETCHFIELDS_GET]);
        $itemId = $file->id;

        return $itemId;
    } catch (Exception $e) {
        return $this->setError('GoogleDrive error: '.$e->getMessage());
    }

    return true;
}

/
 * Simple function to demonstrate how to control file access using "accessControl" callback.
 * This method will disable accessing files/folders starting from '.' (dot)
 *
 * @param  string    $attr    attribute name (read|write|locked|hidden)
 * @param  string    $path    absolute file path
 * @param  string    $data    value of volume option accessControlData
 * @param  object    $volume  elFinder volume driver object
 * @param  bool|null $isDir   path is directory (true: directory, false: file, null: unknown)
 * @param  string    $relpath file path relative to volume root directory started with directory separator
 * @return bool|null
 /
function access($attr, $path, $data, $volume, $isDir, $relpath) {
    $basename = basename($path);
    return $basename[0] === '.'                  // if file/folder begins with '.' (dot)
             && strlen($relpath) !== 1           // but with out volume root
        ? !($attr == 'read' || $attr == 'write') // set read+write to false, other (locked+hidden) set to true
        :  null;                                 // else elFinder decide it itself
}
// Documentation for connector options:
// https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder/wiki/Connector-configuration-options
$opts = array(
    // 'debug' => true,
    'roots' => array(
        // Items volume
        array(
            'driver'        => 'LocalFileSystem',           // driver for accessing file system (REQUIRED)
            'path'          => '../files/',                 // path to files (REQUIRED)
            'URL'           => dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) . '/../files/', // URL to files (REQUIRED)
            'trashHash'     => 't1_Lw',                     // elFinder's hash of trash folder
            'uploadDeny'    => array('all'),                // All Mimetypes not allowed to upload
            'uploadAllow'   => array('image', 'text/plain', 'application/pdf'),// Mimetype image and text/plain allowed to upload
            'uploadOrder'   => array('deny', 'allow'),      // allowed Mimetype image and text/plain only
            'accessControl' => 'access'                     // disable and hide dot starting files (OPTIONAL)
        ),
        // Trash volume
        array(
            'id'            => '1',
            'driver'        => 'Trash',
            'path'          => '../files/.trash/',
            'tmbURL'        => dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) . '/../files/.trash/.tmb/',
            'uploadDeny'    => array('all'),                // Recomend the same settings as the original volume that uses the trash
            'uploadAllow'   => array('image', 'text/plain'),// Same as above
            'uploadOrder'   => array('deny', 'allow'),      // Same as above
            'accessControl' => 'access',                    // Same as above
        )
    )
);
// run elFinder
$connector = new elFinderConnector(new elFinder($opts));
$connector->run();

If you find any problems with elFinder's client side program, please let me know as I will fix it.. Perhaps the result of your connector's ls command is incorrect.

elFinder requests the ls command in the preprocessing of the upload and checks the existing item. If the uploading file name is exists in results of ls and CWD does not have that file, elFinder will request the open command and try to keep the CWD up to date.
It seems to be a bug in elFinder. Since I attempted to fix it please check with Nightly build.. What data will your connector return to the ls command?. The value returned by the ls command should be an object of item name with hash as key ( or array of item names). If intersect is given as a parameter, it is advisable to return only the item names that overlap in the array.

Each command is executed by exec function of elfinder.js. An array of hashes (ID) of the target item is passed as the first argument, and an object (associative array) according to the case is passed as the second argument.
Command execution is often done by click event of a button on the toolbar or click event of the context menu.
The toolbar button is js/ui/button.js, and the context menu is js/ui/contextmenu.js is the source code.

php
'bind' => [
    'open' => [function($cmd, &$result, $args, $elfinder, $volume) {
        if (!empty($result['cwd'])) {
            $cwdHash = $result['cwd']['hash'];
            $cwdPath = $volume->getPath($cwdHash); // you can filtering with $cwdPath
            if (!empty($result['files'])) {
                $files = [];
                foreach($result['files'] as $file) {
                    if ($file['phash'] === $cwdHash && $file['mime'] !== 'directory') {
                        $name = basename($volume->getPath($file['hash']));
                        if (preg_match('/\.txt$/i', $name)) {
                            $files[] = $file;
                        }
                    } else {
                        $files[] = $file;
                    }
                }
                $result['files'] = $files;
            }
        }
    }]

```javascript
// Setup the procedure when send DnD image upload data to elFinder's connector
cke.on('fileUploadRequest', function(e){
    var fileLoader = e.data.fileLoader,
        xhr = fileLoader.xhr,
        formData = new FormData();
    e.stop();
    xhr.open('POST', fileLoader.uploadUrl, true);
    formData.append('cmd', 'upload');

    formData.append('upload[]', fileLoader.file, fileLoader.fileName);
    xhr.send(formData);
}, null, null, 4);
// Setup the procedure when got DnD image upload response
cke.on('fileUploadResponse', function(e){
    var file;
    e.stop();
    var data = e.data,
        res = JSON.parse(data.fileLoader.xhr.responseText);
    if (!res.added || res.added.length < 1) {
        data.message = 'Can not upload.';
        e.cancel();
    } else {
        elfInsrance.exec('reload');
        file = res.added[0];
        if (file.url && file.url != '1') {
            data.url = file.url;
            try {
                data.url = decodeURIComponent(data.url);
            } catch(e) {}
        } else {
            data.url = elfInsrance.options.url + ((elfInsrance.options.url.indexOf('?') === -1)? '?' : '&') + 'cmd=file&target=' + file.hash;
        }
    }
});

    } else if (isset($_GET['status'])) {
        echo '{"uname": "'.(isset($_SESSION['ELFINDER_AUTH_USER'])? $_SESSION['ELFINDER_AUTH_USER'] : '').'"}';
    } else {
        if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_ELFINDERUSER']) && isset($auths[$_SERVER['HTTP_X_ELFINDERUSER']]) && $auths[$_SERVER['HTTP_X_ELFINDERUSER']] === $_SERVER['HTTP_X_ELFINDERPASS']) {
            $_SESSION['ELFINDER_AUTH_USER'] = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_ELFINDERUSER'];
            echo '{"uname": "'.$_SERVER['HTTP_X_ELFINDERUSER'].'"}';
        } else {
            header('Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8');
            echo '{"error": "Login faild."}';
        }
    }
    exit();
}

elFinder.prototype.commands.login = function() {
    var self = this,
        fm   = this.fm,
        url  = fm.options.url,
        aopt = {
            dataType: 'json',
            headers: fm.options.customHeaders,
            xhrFields: fm.options.xhrFields
        };
    this.alwaysEnabled  = true;
    this.updateOnSelect = false;
    this.options = {
        ui       : 'loginbutton',
        loginUrl : url+'?login',
        logoutUrl: url+'?logout',
        statusUrl: url+'?status'
    };
    this.value = null;
    this.handlers = {
        'open': function(){
            if (self.value === null) {
                self.value = '';
                $.ajax(self.options.statusUrl, aopt).done(function(res){
                    self.value = res.uname? res.uname : '';
                    self.update(void(0), self.value);
                });
            }
        } 
    };
this.getstate = function() {
    return this.value? 1 : 0;
};

this.exec = function() {
    var dologin = (! self.value),
        getAjax = function(opt) {
            return $.ajax(self.options[dologin? 'loginUrl' : 'logoutUrl'], opt).done(function(res){
                if (res.error) {
                    fm.error(res.error);
                } else {
                    self.update(void(0), res.uname? res.uname : '');
                    var tm,
                        dfd = fm.sync().always(function() { 
                            tm && clearTimeout(tm); 
                        });

                    tm = setTimeout(function() {
                        fm.notify({type : 'reload', cnt : 1, hideCnt : true});
                        dfd.always(function() { fm.notify({type : 'reload', cnt  : -1}); });
                    }, fm.notifyDelay);
                }
            }).fail(function(e) {
                var res = e.responseText;
                try {
                    res = JSON.parse(res);
                } catch(e) {
                    res = {};
                }
                res.error && fm.error(res.error);
            });
        },
        btn = {},
        req = function() {
            if (user.val() && pass.val()) {
                aopt['headers']['X-elFInderUser'] = user.val();
                aopt['headers']['X-elFInderPass'] = pass.val();
            }
            getAjax(aopt).done(function() {
                dfd.resolve();
            }).fail(function(e) {
                dfd.reject();
            }).always(function() {
                dialog.elfinderdialog('destroy');
            });
        },
        dfd, dialog, user, pass, form;
    if (dologin) {
        dfd = $.Deferred();
        user = $('<input class="elfinder-tabstop" type="text" placeholder="demouser">');
        pass = $('<input class="elfinder-tabstop" type="password" placeholder="demouser">');
        form = $('<div style="text-align:center;">').append($('<p>').append('Username: ', user), $('<p>').append('Password: ', pass))
            .on('keyup keydown keypress', function(e) {
                e.key !== 'Escape' && e.key !== 'Tab' && e.stopPropagation();
                if (e.type === 'keypress' && e.key === 'Enter') {
                    if (user.val() !== '' && pass.val() !== '') {
                        req();
                    } else {
                        (user.val()? pass : user).focus();
                    }
                }
            });
        btn[fm.i18n('login')] = req;
        btn[fm.i18n('btnCancel')] = function() {
            dialog.elfinderdialog('destroy');
        };
        dialog = fm.dialog(form, {
            title: fm.i18n('login'),
            buttons: btn,
            allowMinimize: false,
            destroyOnClose: true,
            open: function() {
                user.focus();
            },
            close: function() {
                (dfd.state() !== 'resolved') && dfd.reject();
            }
        });
        return dfd;
    } else {
        return getAjax(aopt);
    }
};

}

class elFinderPluginMySanitizer extends elFinderPluginSanitizer
{
    protected function sanitizeFileName($filename, $opts, $allows = array()) {
        $fileName = md5(microtime());
        $fileExt  = pathinfo($name, PATHINFO_EXTENSION);
        return $fileName.'.'.$fileExt;
    }
}
